content: NCV Concrete vibrator whips Internal concrete vibrator whip for use with Hilti NCV 10-22 battery-powered backpack concrete vibrators (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Specialty power tools- ### FEATURES:Features Built for tough jobsite conditions – IP67 water-resistance classification to better withstand spray and splatter during concrete pours Easier to change – plug-in interface to save time when switching to a different whip size Maximize the versatility of your NCV 10-22 – choose from 3 diameters and 3 lengths of whip to best suit the volume of concrete to be compacted Integrated ON!Track tag – includes the latest Bluetooth® tag for equipment management using Hilti ON!Track Applications Internal concrete vibrator whip for use with Hilti NCV 10-22 battery-powered backpack concrete vibrators ### TECHNICAL DATA: IP protection class: IP 67 Technical Data | IP protection class | IP 67 ### ITEMS- 2363254 -
